document.full_text: syrian activists said that video posted online showed hundreds of women from the village of bayda, where large numbers of men have been detained, protesting on the country's main coastal highway on wednesday.
document.title: the lede: syrian women demand release of detainees
lines_and_colors: syrian activists said that video posted online showed hundreds of women from the village of bayda, where large numbers of men have been detained, protesting on the country's main coastal highway on wednesday.
